course_title: Freshman Seminar: Latin American and Caribbean Studies: Writing Bodies in the World
class_notes:
(Same as ENGCW 190 1, AAS 190 3, ENVS 190 3)
Complete course atlas information (including texts and grading) will be available on the Creative Writing Program website: https://creativewriting.emory.edu/index.html
course_description: Introduces first-year students to Latin America and/or the Caribbean, and to different disciplinary approaches. Topics and regions covered vary.
